code: import moment from'moment';import'moment/locale/fr';moment.locale('fr');var getCurrentForecast=function getCurrentForecast(data){return{weekday:moment(data.dt*1000).format('dddd'),date:moment(data.dt*1000).format('D MMMM YYYY'),location:data.name,country:data.sys.country,temperature:Math.round(data.main.temp),weatherIcon:"http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/".concat(data.weather[0].icon,"@2x.png"),weatherDescription:data.weather[0].description};};export default getCurrentForecast;
